key.name: bedtime-mode-active
key.description: This flag is used to enable/disable the bedtime mode.

key.name: automatic-schedule
key.description: Enables automatic scheduling of the bedtime mode in the time range specified by the start and end times

key.name: schedule-start-hours
key.description: The hours at which the bedtime mode will be enabled.

key.name: schedule-start-minutes
key.description: The minutes at which the bedtime mode will be enabled.

key.name: schedule-end-hours
key.description: The hours at which the bedtime mode will be disabled.

key.name: schedule-end-minutes
key.description: The minutes at which the bedtime mode will be disabled.

key.name: ondemand-button-location
key.description: Location where the on-demand button should be placed.

key.name: ondemand-button-bar-manual-position
key.summary: Enable manual position for the On-Demand button
key.description: Enables manual positioning in the Top Bar for the On-Demand buttton.

key.name: ondemand-button-bar-position-value
key.summary: Top bar manual position for the On-demand button
key.description: The manual position value for the On-Demad button. It should be a number from 0 to 99. 0 will put the button on the left side of the icons group. A greater value will move the icon to the right.

key.name: ondemand-button-visibility
key.description: If the value is set to "active-schedule" then the button will be displayed only when "automatic-schedule" is enabled and the configured schedule is active.
